snippet.textDisplay: I'm a sucker for games with style, and if there's one thing Sang-Froid oozes it's style. The fact that the game itself is an extremely compelling weird mix of tower defense, RTS and hack'n'slash doesn't hurt it at all, either.
snippet.textOriginal: I'm a sucker for games with style, and if there's one thing Sang-Froid oozes it's style. The fact that the game itself is an extremely compelling weird mix of tower defense, RTS and hack'n'slash doesn't hurt it at all, either.

snippet.textDisplay: J'ai ce jeu depuis pas mal de temps. Il est très sympa, mais assez difficile je trouve. L'ambiance est géniale, en grande partie grâce aux musiques, et aux dialogues, doublés en Québécois avec l'accent, pour un français, c'est juste hilarant ! :D
snippet.textOriginal: J'ai ce jeu depuis pas mal de temps. Il est très sympa, mais assez difficile je trouve. L'ambiance est géniale, en grande partie grâce aux musiques, et aux dialogues, doublés en Québécois avec l'accent, pour un français, c'est juste hilarant ! :D

snippet.textOriginal: AAAUUU loved it

snippet.textDisplay: I really like how upbeat this song is.  By any chance Gabe, do you know what the title translates to in English?

snippet.textDisplay: The Two Fridays
snippet.textOriginal: The Two Fridays

snippet.textDisplay: This is an indie game mixing tower defense with 3rd person action, it's fairly well rated although it has some technical problems. It takes place in 1850s Eastern Canada and it's made by french canadians, so it's only natural there's Quebec folk music. I like to go to a sugar shack at least once a year during winter and there's always this type of music playing live, which is pretty awesome.
snippet.textOriginal: This is an indie game mixing tower defense with 3rd person action, it's fairly well rated although it has some technical problems. It takes place in 1850s Eastern Canada and it's made by french canadians, so it's only natural there's Quebec folk music. I like to go to a sugar shack at least once a year during winter and there's always this type of music playing live, which is pretty awesome.

snippet.textDisplay: @C_Clop It's because French is so similar to English, and it helps that that sentence was really simple..  "Tout le monde" and "everyone", "just une excuse" and "just an excuse", "apres-midi" and "afternoon", etc. are pretty much 1-1 conversions so it's easy for machine translation to get the job done.  It wouldn't look as nice for Japanese or Chinese.
snippet.textOriginal: @C_Clop It's because French is so similar to English, and it helps that that sentence was really simple..  "Tout le monde" and "everyone", "just une excuse" and "just an excuse", "apres-midi" and "afternoon", etc. are pretty much 1-1 conversions so it's easy for machine translation to get the job done.  It wouldn't look as nice for Japanese or Chinese.

snippet.textDisplay:
@C_Clop

Holy fuck, the Translate button works!! It translated exactly what I meant!
snippet.textOriginal:
@C_Clop

Holy fuck, the Translate button works!! It translated exactly what I meant!
